thread.title: Liberals Call Ivanka Trump A ‘Phony’ After She Promotes Religious Tolerance On Twitter
thread.title_full: Liberals Call Ivanka Trump A ‘Phony’ After She Promotes Religious Tolerance On Twitter

author: Hannah Bleau
title: Liberals Call Ivanka Trump A ‘Phony’ After She Promotes Religious Tolerance On Twitter
text:
03:12pm February 21, 2017 Do you like this article? 
Ivanka Trump is no stranger to hate. Progressives harass her on planes . They lecture her at the gym . They flip out over her Instagram photos . It’s how they roll. So why stop now? 
I know. Context is helpful. 
In case you weren’t aware, Jewish community centers have been dealing with a wave of bomb threats.  0'); }); 
The Jerusalem Post reports: googletag.cmd.push(function() { googletag.display('div-gpt-ad-1464204305408-0'); }); 
The threats have been called in to JCCs across the country, according to Paul Goldenberg, the director of Secure Community Network — an affiliate of the Jewish Federations of North America that advises Jewish groups and institutions on security.  1'); }); 
News reports indicated that threats were received by JCCs in Whitefish Bay, Wisconsin; St. Paul, Minnesota; Houston, Texas; Milwaukee, Wisconsin and Birmingham, Alabama. 
This hits close to home for Ivanka. Her husband is Jewish, and she converted to Judaism years ago. That being said, she emphasized the importance of religious tolerance on Twitter. America is a nation built on the principle of religious tolerance. We must protect our houses of worship & religious centers. #JCC 
— Ivanka Trump (@IvankaTrump) February 20, 2017 googletag.cmd.push(function() { googletag.display('div-gpt-ad-1448050117784-4'); });  2'); }); 
Harmless, right? WRONG. Ivanka is a total fraud. Why would ANYONE listen to the spawn of Satan?    3'); }); @IvankaTrump you know what would be a great way of doing that? Have your dad to tell all his nazi/klan supporters to eff off. 
— Alex Leo (@AlexMLeo) February 21, 2017 
Right. We’re all Nazis and KKK supporters. I forgot about that. (The left is in desperate need of new material.) 
— Alafair Burke (@alafairburke) February 21, 2017 
No. No irony. The Trump administration hasn’t promoted religious intolerance. Not in any capacity. And don’t even bother bringing up the executive order on immigration. That was not a Muslim ban. It affected less than 15% of the world’s Muslims. The order had nothing to do with religion and everything to do with high-risk countries. . @IvankaTrump Seriously #Ivanka ? Are you so tone-deaf, or drowning in hubris, that u don’t realize how disingenuous & ironic this tweet is? 
— Andy Ostroy (@AndyOstroy) February 21, 2017 @IvankaTrump Phony. Fake. Fake. Fake.
